concept.title: Pipeline Monitoring
concept.shortdesc: When the runs a pipeline, you can view real-time statistics about the pipeline, examine a sample of the data being processed, and create rules and alerts.

conbody.p:
pipelinesmonitoringmonitoring overviewWhen you access the console as the runs a pipeline, the console displays the pipeline in Monitor mode. In Monitor mode, you can perform the following tasks:
View real-time stage and pipeline statistics
View stage and pipeline error information, including error records for each stage
Take and review a snapshot of data
Configure rules and alerts
View the pipeline history
